articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra criticised for calling Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy ‘South Asian’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Priyanka Chopra recently praised Pakistani-Canadian Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy for her upcoming Star Wars film. She addressed her as ‘South Asian.’ | Bollywood
articles.content: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui on Friday took to Twitter and posted, tagging Priyanka Chopra after she mentioned Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy as South Asian in a post. Priyanka had shared a post to praise S… [+2126 chars]
